digee_: Idk it's not my place to say maybe . But all this doesn't sound half as bad as my life! I don't think about it . And i believe that is very possible to forget.. Posting these incidents here? might get you approval and make you feel like a weight is of your chest or something but honestly you're just re enforcing those thoughts that you maybe didn't think about earlier . And giving people an Image of you to remember. I don't understand why would someone do that , but people are different ... Mental Thresholds are different too. If this made you cut yourself you won't survive a day in my life . But i choose to not talk about it and guess what it does go away ! I'm honestly not trying to demean you or something at all . Just hoping you realise posting such stuff is doing nothing other than making you and all your followers remember . Aka painting an image . Of a Victim . We all are victims of something , sexual abuse , emotional and physical abuse. But only a Few of us have the " courage " to label themselves as the victim . Don't ! You aren't ... No one is ... Life's hard but it will get better. It always does ...and if it's not getting any better , it's about to ! Honestly : There's nothing like ultimate happiness .
